title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 589.12 - Rights of recipients
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 589.12 - Rights of recipients

State Regulations
(a) Recipients
shall have the rights enumerated in Section
527.5
of this Chapter, and the
provider of service shall ensure recipients receive notice of such rights in
compliance with such section. (b) For adult crisis residences, recipients shall have the right to control their
own schedules and activities. (c) Each recipient, family, or identified support, shall be apprised of a grievance
process which ensures the timely review and resolution of complaints. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
589.12

Amended

New

York State Register June 26, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 26, eff. 6/26/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
